trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The demogorgon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The demogorgon has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The demogorgon regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the demogorgon takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the demogorgon's next turn. The demogorgon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The demogorgon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The thessalhydra makes one maw attack and one Flurry of Bites.

action.name: Flurry of Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant plus 10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany tallant, and the target is {@condition grappled}. As an action, the target can escape the grapple by succeeding on a {@dc 14} Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (its choice). Until this grapple ends, the thessalhydra can't use its tail pincer.

action.name: Acid Saliva {@recharge 5}
entries: The thessalhydra spits a glob of acid at a point it can see within 30 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany d'àcid on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The thessalhydra makes a Wisdom (Perception) check with advantage.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The thessalhydra makes a tail pincer attack.
